name: Playdoge
description: PlayDoge is a mobile-based play-to-earn (P2E) game, transforming the iconic Doge meme into a Tamagotchi-style virtual pet, powered by the $PLAY token. In this 2D 8-bit world, your PlayDoge needs care and attention just like a real dog. Feed, train and play with your 2D Doge while guiding it through in-app mini-games to earn $PLAY tokens! Play through the PlayDoge app with your digital Doge companion and form a bond that can never be broken, neglect your Doge and he could run away or worseâ€¦ resulting in your game resetting. Use $PLAY tokens to activate Play-to-Earn rewards for keeping your Doge healthy and beating the game levels!
